helpful:","message_screenshots_attributes":[],"user_id":1}}]
description: This questionnaire helps NGO counselors assess legal status, documentation needs, and logistical requirements for Ukrainian refugees planning return journeys. It covers German de-registration, Ukrainian documentation, family coordination, and special circumstances while respecting temporary protection rights.

title: Financial Recovery Aid Applications
questions: [{"id":10699678759,"body":{"body":"What is your current monthly income from all sources: Less than €500 | €500-€1,000 | €1,000-€1,500 | €1,500-€2,000 | More than €2,000 | Prefer not to say","message_screenshots_attributes":[],"user_id":1}},{"id":15580129869,"body":{"body":"How has your financial situation changed since arriving in Germany: Much worse than in Ukraine | Somewhat worse | About the same | Somewhat better | Much better","message_screenshots_attributes":[],"user_id":1}},{"id":60010972635,"body":{"body":"Are you currently receiving German social benefits: Yes, Bürgergeld | Yes, other benefits | Applied but waiting | No, not eligible | No, haven't applied | Not sure","message_screenshots_attributes":[],"user_id":1}},{"id":57622224382,"body":{"body":"What are your biggest monthly expenses right now: Housing | Food | Healthcare | Childcare | Transportation | Debt payments | Remittances to family | Other","message_screenshots_attributes":[],"user_id":1}},{"id":10711858742,"body":{"body":"Do you currently have access to banking services in Germany: Yes, full banking account | Yes, basic account | Limited access | No, but trying to get access | No, prefer not to use banks","message_screenshots_attributes":[],"user_id":1}},{"id":69601540066,"body":{"body":"Did you own property or a business in Ukraine: Yes, residential property | Yes, commercial property | Yes, business | Yes, both property and business | No, was renting | No property or business","message_screenshots_attributes":[],"user_id":1}},{"id":79022759118,"body":{"body":"Have you experienced property damage or loss due to the conflict: Complete destruction | Severe damage | Some damage | Minor damage | No damage | Unable to verify current status","message_screenshots_attributes":[],"user_id":1}},{"id":78603586140,"body":{"body":"Do you have documentation of your Ukrainian assets or property: Yes, complete documentation | Yes, partial documentation | No, lost during evacuation | No, never had formal documentation | Documents are with family/friends","message_screenshots_attributes":[],"user_id":1}},{"id":71306947403,"body":{"body":"Have you received any compensation for property damage or losses: Yes, from Ukrainian government | currently employed in Germany: Yes, full-time permanent | Yes, part-time permanent | Yes, temporary work | Self-employed | Unemployed but seeking work | Unable to work | Student | Retired","message_screenshots_attributes":[],"user_id":1}},{"id":44555708675,"body":{"body":"How would you describe your current employment compared to your work in Ukraine: Much better position | Somewhat better | Similar level | Somewhat lower level | Much lower level | Not applicable","message_screenshots_attributes":[],"user_id":1}},{"id":24851009974,"body":{"body":"Have you had your professional qualifications recognized in Germany: Yes, fully recognized | Yes, partially recognized | In process of recognition | Applied but rejected | Haven't applied yet | Not necessary for my work | Don't know how to apply","message_screenshots_attributes":[],"user_id":1}},{"id":66792180808,"body":{"body":"What are your most urgent financial needs right now: Basic living expenses | Housing management","message_screenshots_attributes":[],"user_id":1}},{"id":80525974466,"body":{"body":"What type of financial assistance would be most helpful for your recovery: One-time emergency aid | assistance","message_screenshots_attributes":[],"user_id":1}},{"id":55462454754,"body":{"body":"Have you previously applied for financial aid in Germany: Yes, successfully received aid | Yes, but description: This questionnaire helps NGO counselors assess the financial recovery needs of Ukrainian refugees seeking aid in Germany. It evaluates current financial status, losses from displacement, employment situation, and recovery goals to match individuals with appropriate financial assistance programs and support services.
